title: Connectors do not bind to their ports in Catalina.load(), but only later in start()
description: Testing with trunk at revision 957942, thus this supposedly affects version 7.0.0 as well. In Tomcat 6, there is a separate prestartup phase when starting Tomcat to allow Connectors to bind to their ports before other parts of Tomcat are started. This is implemented by having separate Bootstrap.load(String[]) and Bootstart.start() methods [1]. However, in the current version, this behavior is broken and the Connectors do not bind to their ports properly. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Start the first Tomcat instance successfully.
OB: Add the following line to conf/catalina.properties: org.apache.catalina.startup.EXITONINITFAILURE=true
SR: Start two Tomcat instances with the same configuration at the same time.
